Class OAuthTokenManager

extends Object
    An OAuth token manager class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OAuthTokenManager

        public OAuthTokenManager(OAuthContract contract,
                         DateFactory dateFactory,
                         @Named(value="media.oauth.uri")
                         String oAuthUri,
                         @Named(value="media.oauth.client.id")
                         String clientId,
                         @Named(value="media.oauth.client.secret")
                         String clientSecret,
                         @Named(value="media.oauth.scope")
                         String scope)
                  throws URISyntaxException
        Creates an OAuth token manager instance with specified contract, date factory, ACS base URI, client ID, and client secret.
        Parameters:
        contract - A OAuthContract object instance that represents the OAUTH contract.
        dateFactory - A DateFactory object instance that represents the date factory.
        oAuthUri - A String object instance that represents the ACS base URI.
        clientId - A String object instance that represents the client ID.
        clientSecret - A String object instance that represents the client secret.
        Throws:
        URISyntaxException
